title: Battlefield 4 Beta XBOX360 - ONLINE ONLY [P2PDL]
description:
Here is the Battlefield 4 Beta for xbox 360. For those of you that don't want to wait a few more days to get it off xbl dashboard (USA). Its region free and and all you have to do is:



1. Unrar

2. Format a USB Flash Drive in your Xbox then insert in your PC

3. Open Horizon/Any other tool you use.

4. Transfer the file onto your USB

5. Open BF4 BETA and transfer to your USB Flash Drive

6. Insert to your Xbox 360 and play or move to HDD

No need to change or insert your id's as its a beta and there null.

Notes:

Oct 4th is the official release date for xbox Gold members to download battlefield beta. but if you have a premium account you get it a bit early. :).

Thanks DrWoo

Confirmed by DRwoo working on RETAIL console and ONLINE ONLY
RGH untested - as online only wouldnt recommend
